summary: A test suite that validates the behavior of the spatial transformer component within a 2D transformer model, covering default settings and a range of configurable options such as normalization layers, attention bias, cross‑attention dimensions, dropout, feed‑forward configurations, GELU approximations, discrete handling, and timestep integration.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the 2D transformer’s spatial attention mechanisms so that downstream AI products (e.g., image synthesis or diffusion pipelines) function reliably across different model configurations.
